creator: ST0079110@techmahindra.com
text:
I am Trying to Record a Thick Client Web Application using Jmeter 2.4. using Http Proxy Server. 

But I am getting below error after user authorization in logs 
2012/08/23 18:48:53 ERROR - jmeter.protocol.http.proxy.Proxy: Problem with SSL certificate? Ensure browser is set to accept the JMeter proxy cert: Connection reset 


The Sessions Hangs and doesn't proceed further.
i have tried https spoofing, including certificates in browser and restarting the session
creator: ST0079110@techmahindra.com

text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.
Please ask your question on jmeter user mailing list:
